tool_description: Analyzes user reviews and ratings for hair care products to provide insights on effectiveness, common experiences, and suitability for specific hair types.

product_name.description: Name of the product to analyze reviews for

user_hair_type.description: User's hair type to filter relevant reviews

specific_concerns.description: Specific issues to look for in reviews

minimum_review_rating.description: Minimum star rating to include in analysis (1-5)

error_messages: Product not found: The specified product name could not be found in review databases
Invalid hair type: Hair type must be a valid classification for filtering reviews
Invalid rating range: Minimum review rating must be between 1-5
Insufficient review data: Not enough reviews available for meaningful analysis
usage: Enter the product name, your hair type, any specific concerns to focus on, and optionally set minimum rating threshold for review analysis.

overall_rating.description: Average rating score for this product

total_reviews_analyzed.description: Number of reviews included in analysis

hair_type_specific_insights.description: Experiences from users with similar hair type
